basic.Peptide Name: M-zodatoxin-Lt4a (M-ZDTX-Lt4a; Latarcin-4a, Ltc-4a; spiders, Arthropods, animals)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.16735513]Gram-positive bacteria:Arthrobacter globiformis VKM Ac-1112 (MIC=0.3 µM), Bacillus subtilis VKM B-501 (MIC=1.1 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli DH5-alpha (MIC=4.5 µM), Escherichia coli MH1 (MIC=3.2 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1 (MIC>35 µM);Fungi:Pichia pastoris GS115 (MIC=36 µM), Saccharomyces cerevisiae Y190 (MIC=18 µM).
